org.apache.hadoop.hbase.quotas

类 QuotaRetriever

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.quotas.QuotaRetriever
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Iterable<QuotaSettings>

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
public class QuotaRetriever
extends Object
implements Closeable, Iterable<QuotaSettings>
    Scanner to iterate over the quota settings.

        public static QuotaRetriever open(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
                           throws IOException
        Open a QuotaRetriever with no filter, all the quota settings will be returned.
        参数:

        返回:
        the QuotaRetriever

        返回:
